nodes.text: The Doxxen system was a star system that was located within the Seitia sector, a part of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories and Western Reaches regions. It was the origin point of Doxxen tea.
The Doxxen system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square K-19.
